    • AnimatedMask

      public AnimatedMask(String name, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin, long period, boolean async, Mask... childMask)
      Create a new mask
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the mask
      plugin - the plugin
      period - the period between 2 child buttons
      async - should the update task be asynchronous ?
      childMask - the child mask (or frame)
